title: unable to connect to webdav using cyberduck
body:
when i try to connect to my owncloud webdav url using cyberduck/4.2.1 (9350) (windows 7/6.1) i get an http 403 forbidden response as shown in the following log (username and host name obfuscated).

example url: https://owncloud.my.host/~username/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/

propfind /%7eusername/owncloud/remote.php/webdav/ http/1.1
depth: 1
content-type: text/xml; charset=utf-8
content-length: 99
host: owncloud.my.host
connection: keep-alive
user-agent: cyberduck/4.2.1 (9350) (windows 7/6.1) (x86)
http/1.1 403 forbidden
date: thu, 15 nov 2012 08:13:44 gmt
server: apache
x-powered-by: php/5.3.15
expires: thu, 19 nov 1981 08:52:00 gmt
cache-control: no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0
pragma: no-cache
set-cookie: phpsessid=bd305231eaf8f6b0788681d736373d02; path=/; httponly
keep-alive: timeout=5, max=75
connection: keep-alive
transfer-encoding: chunked
content-type: application/xml; charset=utf-8
propfind / http/1.1
depth: 1
content-type: text/xml; charset=utf-8
content-length: 99
host: owncloud.my.host
connection: keep-alive
user-agent: cyberduck/4.2.1 (9350) (windows 7/6.1) (x86)
cookie: phpsessid=bd305231eaf8f6b0788681d736373d02
cookie2: $version=1
http/1.1 302 moved temporarily
date: thu, 15 nov 2012 08:13:47 gmt
server: apache
location: /404.html
content-length: 0
keep-alive: timeout=5, max=74
connection: keep-alive
content-type: text/html
propfind /404.html http/1.1
depth: 1
content-type: text/xml; charset=utf-8
content-length: 0
host: owncloud.my.host
connection: keep-alive
user-agent: cyberduck/4.2.1 (9350) (windows 7/6.1) (x86)
cookie: phpsessid=bd305231eaf8f6b0788681d736373d02
cookie2: $version=1
http/1.1 302 moved temporarily
date: thu, 15 nov 2012 08:13:47 gmt
server: apache
location: /404.html
content-length: 0
keep-alive: timeout=5, max=73
connection: keep-alive
content-type: text/html
